summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Data Management feature. Backend APIs working well (88.9% success rate). Fixed critical frontend Select component issues that were preventing dialogs from opening. All core functionality now working including navigation, data stats, bulk delete dialogs, and danger zone.

minor_bugs.issue: Unauthorized access protection not working - returns 200 instead of 401 when no auth token
minor_bugs.impact: Security concern - non-authenticated users can access data stats

ui_bugs.issue: Select components had empty string values causing React errors and preventing dialogs from opening

passed_tests: Data Management page navigation from sidebar
GET /api/data-management/stats returns all 17 data types with counts
Validation for invalid data types and wrong confirmation text
Bulk Delete dialog opens and displays filter options
Delete Everything dialog opens with confirmation input
Warning banner and danger zone sections visible
Actions dropdown shows Bulk Delete and Delete All options
Navigation link visible in Administration section for admin users
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix unauthorized access protection in data management endpoints - should return 401 for unauthenticated requests instead of 200
